name: tokentally
description: Token usage in, dollar totals out.

scripts.format: biome format --write src tests package.json tsconfig.json tsconfig.build.json vitest.config.ts README.md
scripts.lint: biome check src tests package.json tsconfig.json tsconfig.build.json vitest.config.ts README.md
scripts.lint:oxlint:typeaware: pnpm exec -- oxlint --deny-warnings --type-aware --tsconfig tsconfig.json --config .oxlintrc.json src tests
scripts.lint:fix: biome check --write src tests package.json tsconfig.json tsconfig.build.json vitest.config.ts README.md
scripts.check: pnpm lint && pnpm lint:oxlint:typeaware && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test:coverage
